description:
You can sure tell Spiro was not very sure about getting head from a guy.
I probably should have had Jet just blow him, instead of starting off with a side-by-side jerk-off, but Jet cums so easily. I figured I would get a good facial in the end, with Jet busting his nut moments later, which of course is what I got.
Spiro looks pretty uptight the first 5 minutes of the video. But after a while he is looking a lot less at the TV and not quite so frozen. Once we get him upright he is more in the groove, and you can tell he likes being dominant and even having his ass licked.
The cum shot is tremendous! Spiro's aim is spot on with globs flying into Jet's open mouth. Jet spits some up to make sure we can see some of it, and it oozes down into his eye. He then shoots his own load, eyes clinched shut trying to avoid the shame of cummy red-eye...sadly he went home with an achy red eyeball.
But what a nice ending!
title: Jet & Spiro - Serviced
